data.price: Dan janganlah kamu membuat kerusakan di muka bumi, sesudah (Allah) memperbaikinya dan berdoalah kepada-Nya dengan rasa takut (tidak akan diterima) dan harapan (akan dikabulkan).  Sesungguhnya rahmat Allah amat dekat kepada orang-orang yang berbuat baik.
data.arabic: وَلَا تُفۡسِدُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بَعۡدَ إِصۡلَٰحِهَا وَٱدۡعُوهُ خَوۡفٗا وَطَمَعًاۚ إِنَّ رَحۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ قَرِيبٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

meta.transliteration: walā tuf'sidū fī al-arḍi baʿda iṣ'lāḥihā wa-id'ʿūhu khawfan waṭamaʿan inna raḥmata al-lahi qarībun mina al-muḥ'sinīna

dua.name: Dua for Sustainable Living
dua.significanceReason: Encourages responsible stewardship of resources and environmental consciousness.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
